versions.localizedDescription:
• New settings tab: now with better organization and search support.
• Wide page isolation and splitting: when using the double page layout (e.g. on iPads), wide pages can be detected and isolated, and when using the single page layout, there’s a new option to automatically split into two pages.
• Komga tracker: automatically tracks reading history for Komga sources, including page progress in individual volumes.
• Library refresh progress bar: when a library refresh starts, there’s now a better indicator of the progress towards completion.
• Backup user settings: the content that’s backed up can now be configured, and allows including user settings.
• Other features and fixes: content rating tags in search results, an invert tap zones option, a Bangumi tracker, relative dates for chapter releases, and many bug fixes!

The latest ipa is "Aidoku.ipa", build 0.7.2 (3), up to commit be6089aefa58d4a2bd77c0c93dcad40deb19bbf6.
